Comment 5: 
Just realized that the test wasn't fair. But even with a fair version the timings aren't
much different:

: time ./regex 1

real	0m0.489s
user	0m0.488s
sys	0m0.000s
: time ./regex 2

real	0m0.486s
user	0m0.488s
sys	0m0.000s
: time ./regex 3

real	0m0.512s
user	0m0.512s
sys	0m0.000s
: time ./regex 4

real	0m0.011s
user	0m0.012s
sys	0m0.000s
: time ./regex 5

user	0m0.020s
